   1  .admintabs{
   2  float:center;
   3      width:90%;
   4      padding-left:10px;
   5      font-size:93%;
   6      letter-spacing:.8px;
   7      line-height:normal;
   8      border-bottom:1px solid #666;
   9      margin-bottom:1em; /*margin between menu and rest of page*/
  10      overflow:hidden;
  11      margin-left:25px;
  12  }
  13  
  14  .admintabs ul{
  15  margin:0;
  16  padding:10px 10px 0 0px;
  17  list-style:none;
  18  }
  19  
  20  .admintabs li{
  21  display:inline;
  22      margin:0;
  23      padding:0;
  24  }
  25  
  26  .admintabs a{
  27  float:left;
  28  background:url("../images/left_admin.png") no-repeat left top;
  29  margin:0;
  30  padding:0 0 0 6px;
  31  text-decoration:none;
  32  }
  33  
  34  .admintabs a span{
  35  float:left;
  36  display:block;
  37  background:url("../images/right_admin.png") no-repeat right top;
  38  padding:6px 15px 4px 6px;
  39  margin-right:2px;
  40  color:#FFF;
  41  }
  42  
  43  /* Commented Backslash Hack hides rule from IE5-Mac \*/
  44  .admintabs a span {float:none;}
  45  /* End IE5-Mac hack */
  46  
  47  .admintabs a:hover {
  48      background-position:0% -42px;
  49      }
  50  
  51  .admintabs a:hover span {
  52      background-position:100% -42px;
  53      }
  54  .admintabs li.current a{
  55      background-position:0% -42px; /*Shift background image up to start of 2nd tab image*/
  56  }
  57  
  58  .admintabs li.current a span{
  59      background-position:100% -42px; /*Shift background image up to start of 2nd tab image*/
  60  }
  61  .tabcontainer{
  62  clear: left;
  63  width:95%; /*width of 2nd level sub menus*/
  64  height:1.5em; /*height of 2nd level sub menus. Set to largest's sub menu's height to avoid jittering.*/
  65  }
  66  
  67  .tabcontent{
  68  display:none;
  69  }
